paper_keywords: system of singular boundary value problems
paper_abstract: We consider some systems of boundary value problems where the nonlinearities may be singular in the independent variable and may also be singular in the dependent arguments. Using the Schauder fixed point theorem, we establish criteria such that the systems of boundary value problems have at least one constant-sign solution. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Constant-sign solutions of systems of higher order boundary value problems with integrable singularities
